ThinkGeek was a merchandise brand<ref>{{w|ThinkGeek}}</ref> that produced a large line of Minecraft merchandise.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20111121004547/http://www.thinkgeek.com/interests/minecraft/</ref>

ThinkGeek's Minecraft merchandise items on their online store included:

*Action figures
*Activity blocks
*Backpacks
*Beads
*Beanies
*Books
*Bottle openers
*Calanders
*Cookie cutters
*Earrings
*Foam creeper statue
*Foam swords and pickaxes
*Funko pops
*Gloves
*Hangers
*Hats
*Hoodies
*Keychains
*Light up golden apple
*Light up lava
*Light up potion
*Light up redstone and diamond ore
*Light up torch
*Mugs
*Necklaces
*Papercraft sets
*Phone cases
*Pins
*Plush toys
*Scarves
*Sheet magnets
*Shirts
*Songbook
*Sticky notes
*Touchscreen stylus
*USB desktop nether portal
*USB wall charger
*Vinyl figures
*Wearable mob heads
*Wither spinner
*Wrapping paper
